name: Soot (itch)
description:
✧NEWS✧
9.25.2017 : Shiny Update

Find your purpose in a world covered in darkness and a mysterious dust.

✓ Gamepad-able
✓ Single player
✓ 10-15 minute playtime

This game preview was made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 7. The theme was 'Overgrown'
